data.name: Mareep

attacks.name: Thundershock
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

data.flavorText: Its fluffy coat swells to double when static electricity builds up. Touching it can be shocking.

data.name: Mareep

attacks.name: Cotton Guard
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Thunder Jolt
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokémon does 10 damage to itself.

data.flavorText: Its fluffy coat swells to double when static electricity builds up. Touching it can be shocking.

data.name: Mareep

attacks.name: Thunder Wave
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

data.flavorText: It stores lots of air in its soft fur, allowing it to stay cool in summer and warm in winter.

data.name: Mareep

attacks.name: Shock Bolt
attacks.text: Discard all Lightning Energy from this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: It stores lots of air in its soft fur, allowing it to stay cool in summer and warm in winter.

data.name: Mareep
data.flavorText: Rubbing its fleece generates electricity. You'll want to pet it because it's cute, but if you use your bare hand, you'll get a painful shock.

data.name: Mareep
data.flavorText: Its fleece grows continually. In the summer, the fleece is fully shed, but it grows back in a week.

attacks.name: Jolt
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

data.name: Mareep

attacks.name: Thunder Jolt
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, Mareep does 10 damage to itself.

data.flavorText: Its fleece grows continually. In the summer, the fleece is fully shed, but it grows back in a week.

data.name: Mareep

attacks.name: Static Electricity
attacks.text: Search your deck for a number of Lightning Energy cards up to the number of Mareep in play (both yours and your opponent's) and attach them to Mareep. Shuffle your deck afterward.

data.flavorText: If static electricity builds in its body, its fleece doubles in volume. Touching it will shock you.

attacks.name: Minor Errand-Running
attacks.text: Search your deck for a basic Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

data.name: Mareep

attacks.name: Static Electricity
attacks.text: For each Mareep in play, you may search your deck for a Lightning Energy card and attach it to Mareep. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Thundershock
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

data.flavorText: If static electricity builds in its body, its fleece doubles in volume. Touching it will shock you.

data.name: Mareep
data.flavorText: Its soft wool coat captures air, allowing it to remain cool during the summer and warm in the winter.

data.name: Mareep

abilities.name: Fluffy Pillow
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, you may leave your opponent's Active Pokémon Asleep.

data.flavorText: It stores lots of air in its soft fur, allowing it to stay cool in summer and warm in winter.

attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon's attacks do 20 less damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.name: Team Rocket's Mareep

attacks.name: Procurement
attacks.text: Search your deck for an Item card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
